item.description:
Hey fellow Organizers!

Please take a moment to RSVP for the next Boston Meetup Organizers Meetup on Wednesday, April 4th. These meetings will be a combination of socializing and strategizing.

If you've had some success running your group we want to celebrate with you! If you've been struggling we want to support you.

Ways to support each other:
Suggest venues to hold meetings
Suggest places to post events on-line & around town
Attend each other's events
Network. Network. Network!

If you've got specific suggestions to add to our "agenda" - please e-mail them to Dale. The basic format will be 30 minutes of networking & socializing followed by a Q&A period where we'll get to ask the group specific questions for about 60 minutes (topic this month is "What makes a Meetup successful?") and then more networking & socializing time.

Hope you can join us!dale

Sorry for sending this twice,but I had to do it this way to change the time.
item.name: What makes a Meetup successful? You do.
